verses.text: A \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \add heareth\add* his \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w instruction|strong="H4148"\w*: but a \w scorner|strong="H3887"\w* \w heareth|strong="H8085"\w* not \w rebuke|strong="H1606"\w*.

A \w man|strong="H0376"\w* shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* by the \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* of \add his\add* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*: but the \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* of the \w transgressors|strong="H0898"\w* \add shall eat\add* \w violence|strong="H2555"\w*.

He that \w keepeth|strong="H5341"\w* his \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w keepeth|strong="H8104"\w* his \w life|strong="H5315"\w*: \add but\add* he that openeth \w wide|strong="H6589"\w* his \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* shall have \w destruction|strong="H4288"\w*.

The \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* of the \w sluggard|strong="H6102"\w* \w desireth|strong="H0183"\w*, and \add hath\add* nothing: but the \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* of the \w diligent|strong="H2742"\w* shall be made \w fat|strong="H1878"\w*.

A \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \add man\add* \w hateth|strong="H8130"\w* \w lying|strong="H1697"\w*: but a \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \add man\add* is \w loathsome|strong="H0887"\w*, and cometh to \w shame|strong="H2659"\w*.

\w Righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* \w keepeth|strong="H5341"\w* \add him that is\add* \w upright|strong="H8537"\w* in the \w way|strong="H1870"\w*: but \w wickedness|strong="H7564"\w* \w overthroweth|strong="H5557"\w* the \w sinner|strong="H2403"\w*.\f + \fr 13.6 \ft the sinner: Heb. sin\f*

There \w is|strong="H3426"\w* that maketh himself \w rich|strong="H6238"\w*, yet \add hath\add* nothing: \add there is\add* that maketh himself \w poor|strong="H7326"\w*, \w yet|strong="H3605"\w* \add hath\add* \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w riches|strong="H1952"\w*.

The \w ransom|strong="H3724"\w* of a \w man’s|strong="H0376"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \add are\add* his \w riches|strong="H6239"\w*: but the \w poor|strong="H7326"\w* \w heareth|strong="H8085"\w* not \w rebuke|strong="H1606"\w*.

The \w light|strong="H0216"\w* of the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \w rejoiceth|strong="H8055"\w*: but the \w lamp|strong="H5216"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* shall be put \w out|strong="H1846"\w*.\f + \fr 13.9 \ft lamp: or, candle\f*
Only by \w pride|strong="H2087"\w* \w cometh|strong="H5414"\w* \w contention|strong="H4683"\w*: but with the well \w advised|strong="H3289"\w* \add is\add* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*.

\w Wealth|strong="H1952"\w* \add gotten\add* by \w vanity|strong="H1892"\w* shall be \w diminished|strong="H4591"\w*: but he that \w gathereth|strong="H6908"\w* by \w labour|strong="H3027"\w* shall \w increase|strong="H7235"\w*.\f + \fr 13.11 \ft by labour: Heb. with the hand\f*

\w Hope|strong="H8431"\w* \w deferred|strong="H4900"\w* maketh the \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w sick|strong="H2470"\w*: but \add when\add* the \w desire|strong="H8378"\w* \w cometh|strong="H0935"\w*, \add it is\add* a \w tree|strong="H6086"\w* of \w life|strong="H2416"\w*.

Whoso \w despiseth|strong="H0936"\w* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* shall be \w destroyed|strong="H2254"\w*: but he that \w feareth|strong="H3373"\w* the \w commandment|strong="H4687"\w* shall be \w rewarded|strong="H7999"\w*.\f + \fr 13.13 \ft shall be rewarded: or, shall be in peace\f*

The \w law|strong="H8451"\w* of the \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \add is\add* a \w fountain|strong="H4726"\w* of \w life|strong="H2416"\w*, to \w depart|strong="H5493"\w* from the \w snares|strong="H4170"\w* of \w death|strong="H4194"\w*.

\w Good|strong="H2896"\w* \w understanding|strong="H7922"\w* \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w* \w favour|strong="H2580"\w*: but the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of \w transgressors|strong="H0898"\w* \add is\add* \w hard|strong="H0386"\w*.

Every \w prudent|strong="H6175"\w* \add man\add* \w dealeth|strong="H6213"\w* with \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w*: but a \w fool|strong="H3684"\w* layeth \w open|strong="H6566"\w* \add his\add* \w folly|strong="H0200"\w*.\f + \fr 13.16 \ft layeth…: Heb. spreadeth\f*

A \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w messenger|strong="H4397"\w* \w falleth|strong="H5307"\w* into \w mischief|strong="H7451"\w*: but a \w faithful|strong="H0529"\w* \w ambassador|strong="H6735"\w* \add is\add* \w health|strong="H4832"\w*.\f + \fr 13.17 \ft a faithful…: Heb. an ambassador of faithfulness\f*

\w Poverty|strong="H7389"\w* and \w shame|strong="H7036"\w* \add shall be to\add* him that \w refuseth|strong="H6544"\w* \w instruction|strong="H4148"\w*: but he that \w regardeth|strong="H8104"\w* \w reproof|strong="H8433"\w* shall be \w honoured|strong="H3513"\w*.

The \w desire|strong="H8378"\w* \w accomplished|strong="H1961"\w* is \w sweet|strong="H6149"\w* to the \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*: but \add it is\add* \w abomination|strong="H8441"\w* to \w fools|strong="H3684"\w* to \w depart|strong="H5493"\w* from \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*.

He that \w walketh|strong="H1980"\w* with \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \add men\add* shall be \w wise|strong="H2449"\w*: but a \w companion|strong="H7462"\w* of \w fools|strong="H3684"\w* shall be \w destroyed|strong="H7321"\w*.\f + \fr 13.20 \ft destroyed: Heb. broken\f*
\w Evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w pursueth|strong="H7291"\w* \w sinners|strong="H2400"\w*: but to the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* shall be \w repayed|strong="H7999"\w*.

A \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \add man\add* leaveth an \w inheritance|strong="H5157"\w* to his \w children’s|strong="H1121"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*: and the \w wealth|strong="H2428"\w* of the \w sinner|strong="H2398"\w* \add is\add* laid \w up|strong="H6845"\w* for the \w just|strong="H6662"\w*.

\w Much|strong="H7230"\w* \w food|strong="H0400"\w* \add is in\add* the \w tillage|strong="H5215"\w* of the \w poor|strong="H7218"\w*: but there \w is|strong="H3426"\w* \add that is\add* \w destroyed|strong="H5595"\w* for \w want|strong="H3808"\w* of \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*.

He that \w spareth|strong="H2820"\w* his \w rod|strong="H7626"\w* \w hateth|strong="H8130"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*: but he that \w loveth|strong="H0157"\w* him \w chasteneth|strong="H4148"\w* him \w betimes|strong="H7836"\w*.

The \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \w eateth|strong="H0398"\w* to the \w satisfying|strong="H7648"\w* of his \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*: but the \w belly|strong="H0990"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* shall \w want|strong="H2637"\w*.
